titleStmt.title: The life and death of the eminently learned, pious, and painful minister of the gospel, Dr. Samuel Winter, sometime provest of Trinity Colledge near Dublin in Ireland together with some rare examples of Gods gracious answers to his prayers, upon several occasions.
titleStmt.author: J. W.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound and slightly faded, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin University.
